title: Navigate forwards to a scrollable listbox in reading mode
task: Navigate forwards to a scrollable listbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the listbox
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Transuranium elements' listbox.
assertion3: Text of the focused option in the listbox 'Neptunium' is conveyed
assertion5: Position of the focused option, 1, is conveyed
assertion6: Number of options in the listbox, 26, is conveyed
